Игра не затянула честно, но играть можно, наиграв столь мало часов в соло, считаю что в игре есть(Пить) чем занятьcя. Однако на долго не затянет, ведь потом вас познакомят с кем-то, они люди плохие, я про депрессию и ненависть к самому себе, за то, что скачали эту игру. Оно того стоит, тут люди прекрасные, жаль что их мало..........

Fun game, might run into a few toxic players but that is to be expected in competitive games. Good with a group of friends that like a good fight. Very strategic and skill based. There are always ways to improve and become a better player. Long story short: easy to play, hard to master.

Nicht gut gefällt mir: Die schreienden russischen Kinder

An incredible game with a lackluster community, I've loved this game for years since i started back in mid 2016, and I've watched things change tremendously. From renovations to the new UI and new character models. The state the game in recently is slightly better than the months previous for sure and despite a bad matchmaking system, I do recommend this game. It's better with friends as are most and although you can play solo queue I don't personally recommend you do so. If you're doing well in matchmaking the next step is likely Faceit or ESEA. This is just how I personally feel about the game, hope you can find the joy I used to find in this game.
